name: CFXMLNodeTypeCode
desc: The various XML data type identification codes that the parser uses to describe XML structures.

items.name: case document
items.desc: Indicates a document where the data string is NULL and the additional information is a pointer to a CFXMLDocumentInfo structure.

items.name: case element
items.desc: Indicates an element where the data string is the name of the tag and the additional information is a pointer to a CFXMLElementInfo structure.

items.name: case processingInstruction
items.desc: Indicates a processing instruction where the data string is the name of the target and the additional information is a pointer to a CFXMLProcessingInstructionInfo structure.

items.name: case comment
items.desc: Indicates a comment section where the data string is the text of the comment and the additional information is NULL.

items.name: case text
items.desc: Indicates a text section where the data string is the textâ€™s contents and the additional information is NULL.

items.name: case cdataSection
items.desc: Indicates a CDATA section where the data string is the text of the CDATA and the additional information is NULL.

items.name: case entity
items.desc: Indicates an entity where the data string is the name of the entity and the additional information is a pointer to a CFXMLEntityInfo structure.

items.name: case entityReference
items.desc: Indicates an entity reference where the data string is the name of the referenced entity and the additional information is a pointer to a CFXMLEntityReferenceInfo structure.

items.name: case documentType
items.desc: Indicates a document type where the data string is the name given to the top-level element and the additional information is a pointer to a CFXMLDocumentTypeInfo structure.

items.name: case whitespace
items.desc: Indicates white space where the data string is the text of the white space and the additional information is NULL.

items.name: case notation
items.desc: Indicates a notation where the data string is the notation name and the additional information is a pointer to a CFXMLNotationInfo structure.

items.name: case elementTypeDeclaration
items.desc: Indicates an element type declaration where the data string is the tag name and the additional information is a pointer to a CFXMLElementTypeDeclarationInfo structure.

items.name: case attributeListDeclaration
items.desc: Indicates an attribute list declaration where the data string is the tag name and the additional information is a pointer to a CFXMLAttributeListDeclarationInfo structure.
